name: TRUST (TRUST)
description:
Synopsis

You and your robotic friend need to go through several challenges, with the help of the narrator, to complete a study on friendship between robots and humans. However, you shouldn't TRUST in everyone.

Features

IN-GAME

  • First And Third Person
  • Storyteller
  • You can control either the player or your ally (Only one at time)

Ally Features

  • Has an ability (UV vision) that can be used to see objects / walls that others can't see
  • Has a gun inside his arm
IN DEVELOPMENT Last Patch Notes - 01/17/2021
    Bug Fixes:
  • When you start as Norbit, BTXVI has now correct animation.
  • When you start as Norbit, walk/run animations fixed where couldn't be played until you had change to BTXVI
  • Norbit now cannot drag BTXVI across the map and vice versa (BTXVI can still drag a little Norbit if his currently following you)
    • Added
  • Main Menu audio has now text input field where you can change the volume by inserting the amount you want
Install instructions

Unzip the files and execute Trust.exe
